Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package etcd for versions less than 3.5.12-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package etcd for versions less than 3.5.12-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package etcd is earlier than 3.5.12-2, affected by CVE-2024-24786
